text: Esmeralda van den Water is a Dutch water polo player. She competed for the Dutch women's national water polo team in the 1987 European Waterpolo Championships, 1989 FIVB Women's Water Polo World Cup. and 1991 World Aquatics Championships. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Dutch water polo players
title: Esmeralda van den Water
